Systems Thinking on Apple Silicon
Home Curriculum Dojo Dipole Install

This site is the public entry point for the Systems Thinking on Apple Silicon curriculum and its companion tools. It provides stable documentation, orientation, and distribution links.

What This Repository Is

  • A canonical public source of truth for the curriculum structure and intent.
  • A set of stable artifacts consumed by external tools.
  • A long-lived interface that favors conservative change.

For a fuller statement of intent, see the repository README and preface.

  • README: /README.md
  • Preface: /PREFACE.md

  • Curriculum overview
  • Dojo overview
  • Dipole philosophy
  • Install Dojo (macOS)
